title: Programas para estudiantes de grado
content: Docencia de grados Nankai University actively builds and develops a professional system that meets the demands of economic and social development and talent training in the 21st century. In the long-term running, it has formed the features of equal emphasis on liberal arts and science, profound foundation, and highlighted application and innovation. At present, Nankai University has 16,372 undergraduates, 26 professional colleges, 92 undergraduate majors, of which 58 are humanities and social sciences majors and 3
